main event: The report describes a cylindrical mass of flame, approximately the size of a grapefruit, that was orange-colored and moved rapidly across the sky before fading out.
interesting points: The object was described as a cylindrical mass of flame that tapered slightly.
The object was about the size of a grapefruit and was orange in color.
The object moved rapidly across the sky before fading out or being obscured by cloud cover.
The object appeared to move in a flat trajectory with no abrupt maneuvers.
The report mentions observing a flashing satellite that passed through the field of vision and performed a natural maneuver.
